title: Loot screen bugged
body:
Hello, I was able to buy 10 chests this morning but upon going to the Loot screen I see the icons on the left all fine but no preview pane/frame on the right. This inhibits opening them or seeing anything there. 

Please reset or see? No one reporting any large Loot problems presently so it's probably me. I have opened and closed the game several times.

Thanks!

replies.body: I looked into your hextech inventory, and I think I see where you were able to open those chests finally! Hit me back up if you're still having issues not being able to see your loot page.
